comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Hi JuicyHMouse -- your note "are these wires?" is interesting. I haven't seen ones like this before, but Goodyear often included plumb lines and other implements in his photos as part of his research. For example: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/brooklyn_museum/2800869636/] You can read more about Goodyear's "architectural refinements" research -- interesting, if a bit controversial at the time -- here. Deb Wythe Digital Lab
